import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./ip.css"; function IpHexDump({ raw }) { if (!raw || raw.length === 0) return
No raw data
; const toHex = (n) => n.toString(16).padStart(2, "0").toUpperCase(); const toAscii = (n) => n >= 0x20 && n <= 0x7E ? String.fromCharCode(n) : "."; // 16 bytes per line const lines = []; for (let i = 0; i < raw.length; i += 16) { const chunk = raw.slice(i, i + 16); const offset = i.toString(16).padStart(4, "0"); // 16바이트를 두 그룹으로 나누기 const first8 = chunk.slice(0, 8).map(toHex).join(" "); const last8 = chunk.slice(8, 16).map(toHex).join(" "); const hexBytes = first8 + " " + last8; // 두 그룹 사이에 여분의 공백 // const hexBytes = chunk // .map((b) => toHex(b)) // .join(" "); const ascii = chunk .map((b) => toAscii(b)) .join(""); lines.push({ offset, hexBytes, ascii }); } return ( 
      {lines.map((line, idx) => (
        

          {line.offset}  {line.hexBytes.padEnd(47)}  {line.ascii}
        

      ))}
); } export default function IpHeader({ ip }) { const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState("decoded"); if (!ip) return null; return (
Layer 3 (IP)
setViewMode(viewMode === "raw" ? "decoded" : "raw") } />
{viewMode === "raw" ? ( 
            {/* {JSON.stringify(ip, null, 2)} */}
            

              
                

                  Version
                  {ip.version}

                  
                    
                  

                

                

                  IHL
                  {ip.ihl}
                


                

                  DSCP
                  {ip.dscp}
                


                

                  ECN
                  {ip.ecn}
                


                

                  Total Length
                  {ip.total_length}
                


                

                  ID
                  {ip.id}
                


                

                  Flags
                  
                    {ip.flags === 2 ? "DF (Don't Fragment)"
                      : ip.flags === 1 ? "MF (More Fragment)"
                      : "-"}
                  
                


                

                  Fragment Offset
                  {ip.fragment_offset}
                


                

                  TTL
                  {ip.ttl}
                


                

                  Protocol
                  
                    {ip.next} [{ip.protocol}]
                  
                


                

                  Checksum
                  
                    0x
                    {ip.checksum != null
                      ? ip.checksum.toString(16).toUpperCase() : "-"}
                  
                


                

                  Source Address
                  {ip.src_addr}
                


                

                  Destination Address
                  {ip.dst_addr}
) : ( {/* Header Row */} {/* Bit index row */} {[...Array(32)].map((_, i) => ( ))} {/* Row 0 */} {/* Row 4 */} {/* Row 8 */} {/* */} {/* Row 12 */} {/* */} {/* Row 16 */} {/* */}
IP Header
Octet 0 1 2 3
Bit{i}
0 Version: {ip.version ?? "-"} IHL: {ip.ihl ?? "-"} DSCP: {ip.dscp} ECN: {ip.ecn} Total Length: {ip.total_length}
32 Identification: {ip.id} Flags: {" "} {ip.flags === 2 ? "DF" : ip.flags === 1 ? ", MF" : "0"} Fragment Offset: {ip.fragment_offset}
864 TTL: {ip.ttl} Protocol: {ip.protocol} ({ip.next}) Header Checksum:0x {/* {ip.checksum} */} {ip.checksum != null ? ip.checksum.toString(16).toUpperCase() : "-"}
1296 Source Address: {ip.src_addr}
16128 Destination Address: {ip.dst_addr}
)}
); }
